es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.bgame.views

Interface SettingsPanel.SettingsListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameWindow
    Enclosing class:
    SettingsPanel

    public static interface SettingsPanel.SettingsListener
    The listener for all the events generated in this panel. Each component action points the corresponding method in this interface.
    Author:
    Jorge

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAiMove()
      Notifies the receiver that the AI move button has been clicked.
      void onColorChange(java.lang.String pieceId, java.awt.Color color)
      Notifies the receiver that a color change has been requested by the user.
      void onModeChange(java.lang.String mode, java.lang.String pieceId)
      Notifies the receiver that a player mode change has been requested by the user
      void onQuit()
      Notifies the receiver that the quit button has been clicked.
      void onRandomMove()
      Notifies the receiver that the random move button has been clicked.
      void onRestart()
      Notifies the receiver that the restart button has been clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • onRandomMove

        void onRandomMove()
        Notifies the receiver that the random move button has been clicked.

      • onAiMove

        void onAiMove()
        Notifies the receiver that the AI move button has been clicked.

      • onColorChange

        void onColorChange(java.lang.String pieceId,
                   java.awt.Color color)
        Notifies the receiver that a color change has been requested by the user.
        Parameters:
        pieceId - the piece whose color is to be changed.
        color - the new color of the piece.

      • onModeChange

        void onModeChange(java.lang.String mode,
                  java.lang.String pieceId)
        Notifies the receiver that a player mode change has been requested by the user
        Parameters:
        mode - the new player mode. It may only have valid values, to be converted to a VisualController#PlayerMode.
        pieceId - the piece whose mode is to be changed.

      • onQuit

        void onQuit()
        Notifies the receiver that the quit button has been clicked.

      • onRestart

        void onRestart()
        Notifies the receiver that the restart button has been clicked.
